query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend container = tostring(Json.container) | extend pod = tostring(Json.pod) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | extend uid = tostring(Json.uid) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Val, container, pod, namespace, uid | summarize restarts = max(Val) - min(Val) by _ResourceId, container, pod, namespace, uid
